languages.text: {n}Голос бога траурно гремит.{/n} "Не Эсхатос виноват в последовавших за его созданием схизме и кровопролитии. Мы виноваты. Сокровенный секрет не должен сгинуть из-за нашего несовершенства. Мы признаем, что Коллектив Амарнат доказал неспособность решить поставленную дилемму и не заслужил возрождения. Пусть же сию дилемму отныне решает Паскаль Ханейманн. Единолично".

{n}The god's voice is thunderous and mournful:{/n} "Eschatos is not to blame for the schism and bloodshed that followed its creation. The blame lies with us. The innermost secret must not be lost because of our imperfection. We recognise that the Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma and does not deserve rebirth. So let the dilemma henceforth be solved by Pasqal Haneumann. Alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос бога траурно гремит.{/n} "Не Эсхатос виноват в последовавших за его созданием схизме и кровопролитии. Мы виноваты. Сокровенный секрет не должен сгинуть из-за нашего несовершенства. Мы признаем, что Коллектив Амарнат доказал неспособность решить поставленную дилемму и не заслужил возрождения. Пусть же сию дилемму отныне решает Паскаль Ханейманн. Единолично".

The Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma it faced. Therefore it must be solved single-handedly by Pasqal Haneumann."

languages.text: {n}神の声が悲しげに響く。{/n}「エスカトの創造にあたって分派と流血が生じた責は、エスカトにない。その責を負うのは私たちだ。我々の不完全さのせいで、最奥の秘密を失ってはならない。アマルナト集合体には直面したジレンマを解決できず、生まれ変わるに値しないと判明した。従って、そのジレンマを解くのはパスカル・ヘニュマンとする。ひとりで解くのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice is thunderous and mournful:{/n} "Eschatos is not to blame for the schism and bloodshed that followed its creation. The blame lies with us. The innermost secret must not be lost because of our imperfection. We recognise that the Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma and does not deserve rebirth. So let the dilemma henceforth be solved by Pasqal Haneumann. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}神の声が悲しげに響く。{/n}「エスカトの創造にあたって分派と流血が生じた責は、エスカトにない。その責を負うのは私たちだ。我々の不完全さのせいで、最奥の秘密を失ってはならない。アマルナト集合体には直面したジレンマを解決できず、生まれ変わるに値しないと判明した。従って、そのジレンマを解くのはパスカル・ヘニュマンとする。ひとりで解くのだ」

languages.text: {n}神明的声音如同雷鸣般震耳欲聋，而又充满悲伤。{/n}“尽管终焉审判带来了分离与伤亡，但错误不在这种力量本身，而在于我们。我们决不能因为我们的瑕疵，而失去我们内心深处最重要的秘密。我们已经意识到，阿玛纳特聚合意识没有能力解决它所带来的困境，因此也根本不值得再次复苏。正因如此，这个困境必须由帕斯卡·哈努曼来解决。由他独自一人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice is thunderous and mournful:{/n} "Eschatos is not to blame for the schism and bloodshed that followed its creation. The blame lies with us. The innermost secret must not be lost because of our imperfection. We recognise that the Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma and does not deserve rebirth. So let the dilemma henceforth be solved by Pasqal Haneumann. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}神明的声音如同雷鸣般震耳欲聋，而又充满悲伤。{/n}“尽管终焉审判带来了分离与伤亡，但错误不在这种力量本身，而在于我们。我们决不能因为我们的瑕疵，而失去我们内心深处最重要的秘密。我们已经意识到，阿玛纳特聚合意识没有能力解决它所带来的困境，因此也根本不值得再次复苏。正因如此，这个困境必须由帕斯卡·哈努曼来解决。由他独自一人。”

languages.text: {n}Bien que tonitruante, la voix du dieu est empreinte de tristesse.{/n} « Eschatos n'est pas à blâmer pour le schisme et le massacre qui a suivi sa création. Nous sommes seuls responsables. Nous ne pouvons pas permettre à notre imperfection de causer la perte du grand secret. Nous admettons que le collectif Amarnat s'est avéré incapable de résoudre le dilemme auquel il a été confronté et qu'il ne mérite pas de renaître. Ainsi, le dilemme doit être résolu par Pasqal Haneumann. Seul. »
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice is thunderous and mournful:{/n} "Eschatos is not to blame for the schism and bloodshed that followed its creation. The blame lies with us. The innermost secret must not be lost because of our imperfection. We recognise that the Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma and does not deserve rebirth. So let the dilemma henceforth be solved by Pasqal Haneumann. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que tonitruante, la voix du dieu est empreinte de tristesse.{/n} « Eschatos n'est pas à blâmer pour le schisme et le massacre qui a suivi sa création. Nous sommes seuls responsables. Nous ne pouvons pas permettre à notre imperfection de causer la perte du grand secret. Nous admettons que le collectif Amarnat s'est avéré incapable de résoudre le dilemme auquel il a été confronté et qu'il ne mérite pas de renaître. Ainsi, le dilemme doit être résolu par Pasqal Haneumann. Seul. »

languages.text: {n}La voz del dios retumba y suena abatida.{/n} «No se debe culpar a Eschatos por el cisma y la matanza que dio lugar su creación. La culpa es solo nuestra. El secreto más profundo no debe perderse por nuestra imperfección. Admitimos que el Colectivo Amarnat ha demostrado ser incapaz de resolver el dilema y por lo tanto no merece renacer. Por ello, Pasqal Haneumann debe resolverlo. En solitario».
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice is thunderous and mournful:{/n} "Eschatos is not to blame for the schism and bloodshed that followed its creation. The blame lies with us. The innermost secret must not be lost because of our imperfection. We recognise that the Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma and does not deserve rebirth. So let the dilemma henceforth be solved by Pasqal Haneumann. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del dios retumba y suena abatida.{/n} «No se debe culpar a Eschatos por el cisma y la matanza que dio lugar su creación. La culpa es solo nuestra. El secreto más profundo no debe perderse por nuestra imperfección. Admitimos que el Colectivo Amarnat ha demostrado ser incapaz de resolver el dilema y por lo tanto no merece renacer. Por ello, Pasqal Haneumann debe resolverlo. En solitario».

languages.text: {n}Die dröhne Stimme des Gottes klingt traurig.{/n} "Eschatos trifft keine Schuld an der Spaltung und dem Blutvergießen, das auf seine Schöpfung folgte. Die Schuld liegt bei uns. Das innerste Geheimnis darf nicht durch unsere Unzulänglichkeit verloren gehen. Wir stellen fest, dass sich das Amarnat-Kollektiv als unfähig erwiesen hat, das Dilemma zu lösen, und deshalb keine Wiedergeburt verdient. Das Dilemma muss daher von Pasqal Haneumann gelöst werden. Allein."
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice is thunderous and mournful:{/n} "Eschatos is not to blame for the schism and bloodshed that followed its creation. The blame lies with us. The innermost secret must not be lost because of our imperfection. We recognise that the Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma and does not deserve rebirth. So let the dilemma henceforth be solved by Pasqal Haneumann. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Gottes ist donnernd und traurig.{/n} "Eschatos trifft keine Schuld an der Spaltung und dem Blutvergießen, das auf seine Schöpfung folgte. Die Schuld liegt bei uns. Das Amarnat-Kollektiv hat sich als unfähig erwiesen, das Dilemma zu lösen, mit dem es konfrontiert war. Es muss daher von Pasqal Haneumann gelöst werden. Allein."

languages.text: {n}Tanrının sesi gür ve matemli:{/n} "Bölünmenin ve onun yaratılmasını takip eden katliamın suçlusu Eskatos değil. O suç bize ait. Kusurlarımız nedeniyle en derin sır kaybedilmemeli. Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün ikilemi çözmekte başarılı olmadığını ve yeniden doğmayı hak etmediğini gördük. Dolayısıyla ikilem, Pasqal Haneumann tarafından çözülecek. Sadece onun tarafından."
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice is thunderous and mournful:{/n} "Eschatos is not to blame for the schism and bloodshed that followed its creation. The blame lies with us. The innermost secret must not be lost because of our imperfection. We recognise that the Amarnat Collective has proved itself incapable of solving the dilemma and does not deserve rebirth. So let the dilemma henceforth be solved by Pasqal Haneumann. Alone."

Kusurlarımız nedeniyle en derin sır kaybedilmemeli. Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün ikilemi çözmekte başarılı olmadığını ve yeniden doğmayı hak etmediğini gördük. Dolayısıyla ikilem, Pasqal Haneumann tarafından çözülecek. Sadece onun tarafından."
